questions.question: Which type of relative clauses can be reduced?
Can it be reduced? - Toronto, which is the largest city in Canada, is not the capital.

choices.answer: Toronto, the largest city in Canada, is not the capital.
Toronto, which the largest city in Canada, is not the...
Toronto, is the largest city in Canada, is not the capital.
Toronto, being the largest city in Canada, is not the...

questions.question: Can it be reduced? - Alex is the one who bought that new car.
Can it be reduced? - The picture which was painted by Picasso is extremely valuable.

choices.answer: The picture which painted by Picasso is extremely valuable.
The picture painted by Picasso is extremely valuable.
The picture was painted by Picasso is extremely valuable.
The picture painting by Picasso is extremely valuable.

questions.question: Can it be reduced? - The professors who are doing research will not teach classes next year.

choices.answer: The professors who are doing research will not teach ...
The professors who doing research will not teach classes ...
The professors doing research will not teach classes ...
The professors researching will not teach classes next year.

questions.question: Can it be reduced? - The dentist fixed my teeth which were rotten.
Can it be reduced? - A meteor that weighs over 440 tons could hit the Earth in 2120.
